name: Webex
description: Integrate with Webex to send, list, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Send Message
tools.description: Send a message to a Webex room (space). Provide the room ID and message text. Supports Markdown formatting.

tools.name: List Rooms
tools.description: List Webex rooms (spaces) the authenticated user belongs to. Returns room names, IDs, and types.

tools.name: Create Room
tools.description: Create a new Webex room (space). Provide a title for the room.

tools.name: List People
tools.description: Search for people in the Webex organization. Filter by email, display name, or organization ID.
